Hogwarts Centaur Camp Unicorn MMAP TAS

Entries.{{ModId}}_Andrew55:
none/74 56/farmer 74 56 2 HogwartsAndrew 73 56 2/skippable/pause 800/
        question null "#Why is Nkiruka helping you impersonate her deceased brother?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsAndrew "She... caused her brother to form an obscurial, a deadly parasitic force."/pause 800/
        move HogwartsAndrew 0 -1 0 true/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsAndrew "At Uagadou, everyone is expected to know how to cast spells without a wand. However, Andrew did not know, and...#$b#Nkiruka belittled him for it."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 28/pause 800/
        question null "#Why are you at Hogwarts?"/pause 800/
        move HogwartsAndrew 0 1 2 true/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsAndrew "Although I am a squib, my brother is not.#$b#I dreamed of something that my brother has the power to, and I do not."/pause 800/
        question null "#What’s that?"/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/
        changeLocation {{ModId}}_HogwartsValley/viewport 192 139 true/pause 800/
        viewport move -2 -2 4500/pause 6000/
        speak HogwartsAndrew "I dream of being an explorer."/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_Suryawati35:
none/61 20/farmer 61 21 0 HogwartsSuryawati 61 19 2/skippable/pause 800/
        emote farmer 8/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsSuryawati "As long as you don't tell anyone, I will answer your questions.$2"/pause 800/
        question null "#I won't tell.#How are you able to transform into a bird?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsSuryawati "After an argument with my father, I ran away, and transformed for the first time.$2"/pause 800/
        question null "#Do your parents know?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsSuryawati "I do not remember my mother.$2#$b#My father... I cannot tell him.$2#$b#He poaches magical creatures...$2"/pause 800/
        emote farmer 28 true/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

        temporaryAnimatedSprite "{{ModId}}/UnicornCommon" 96 96 32 32 99999 1 0 56 64 false false -1 0 2 0 0 0/
        viewport move -2 -2 5000/pause 6000/

        emote farmer 28/
        endSimultaneousCommand/pause 800/

Entries.{{ModId}}_Wizard35:
none/7 9/farmer 8 9 3 Wizard 6 9 1/skippable/pause 800/
        speak Wizard "While the valley appears peaceful, dark forces attempt to penetrate our lands at this very moment."/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/
        changeLocation Woods/viewport 41 20 true/pause 800/
        viewport move -3 -2 5500/pause 6000/
        changeLocation Forest/viewport 7 9 true/pause 800/
        speak Wizard "Hence, our vocation is protecting muggles that reside here."/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_Wizard55:
none/6 35/farmer 7 35 3 Wizard 5 35 1/skippable/pause 800/
        speak Wizard "In more than one instance, dark wizards dominated the wizarding world.#$b#They targeted muggle-born wizards, wizards who had relationships with muggles, and wizards who were supporters of muggle relationships.#$b#At that time, I was afraid for my life, so I erased both of our memories to protect her.#$b#Although protection charms appear banal, we protect families from breaking apart, wizarding and muggles alike."/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Suryawati15:
none/28 40/farmer 25 44 0 HogwartsSuryawati 27 41 3/skippable/pause 800/
        addTemporaryActor {{ModId}}_SuryawatiPhoenix 32 32 34 38 3 false Monster/pause 800/
        move {{ModId}}_SuryawatiPhoenix -5 0 2 false/pause 800/
        move HogwartsSuryawati -3 0 2 false/pause 800/
        emote HogwartsSuryawati 16/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsSuryawati "It's not what it looks like...$2"/pause 800/
        question null "#Were you... a bird?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsSuryawati "You saw nothing!$3"/pause 800/
        beginSimultaneousCommand/
        move HogwartsSuryawati 0 10 2 true/
        emote HogwartsSuryawati 12/
        emote farmer 8/
        endSimultaneousCommand/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Ollivander05:
none/8 17/farmer 7 17 1 HogwartsOllivander 9 17 3/skippable/pause 800/
        question null "#None of these wands are working."/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "Despite years of experience, wandmakers never know how wands will react.#$b#However, what we have agreed upon is that the wand chooses the wizard."/pause 800/
        question null "#Yes, Mr. Ollivander... #I’ve heard of your shop in Diagon Alley, but you have a shop here now?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "I opened this branch after... I was taken from my shop, and haven’t returned... #$b#So, I came here to Hogsmeade. Quainter. Safer. A place to forget.#$b#I have this locket to help me get through. It’s a painting of my daughter."/pause 800/
        question null "#Is your daughter in London?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "Sadly, she has passed."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 28/pause 800/
        question null "#If you can come, every week, Mrs. Granger hosts a support group for victims of Voldemort."/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "We do not speak his name..."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 16/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "#$b#Would you be able to come back another time?"/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_Ollivander25:
none/8 17/farmer 7 17 1 HogwartsOllivander 9 17 3/skippable/pause 800/
        question null "#Mr. Ollivander? Sir?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "Oh, I didn't hear you. Forgive me. I was deep in thought."/pause 800/
        question null "#Are you alright sir? #You seem fatigued."/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "This wand of yew... it is quite unlike any other."/pause 800/
        question null "#I saw that. That was... extraordinary. #I've never seen such potency from a charm."/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "This wand... it elevates me. Every memory of hate, this wand turns it into power, #$b#and I have had tremendous power lately."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 8/pause 800/
        question null "#Be careful. This intensity... it’s affecting you. #Some power isn't meant to be wielded."/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "Wands are meant to be wielded, and I intend to wield this one."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 40/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_Ollivander45:
none/8 6/farmer 7 6 1 HogwartsOllivander 9 6 3/skippable/pause 800/
        question null "#How is it possible that your wand is more powerful than other wands I've witnessed?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "This is no ordinary yew wand."/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/
        changeToTemporaryMap {{ModId}}_HogwartsValley/viewport 92 132 true/warp HogwartsOllivander 92 132/faceDirection HogwartsOllivander 0/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "It's been some time, Albus.#$b#Curious... A yew tree.#$b#This tree grew...#$b#From the Dark Lord's wand!"/pause 800/
        emote HogwartsOllivander 12/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 7 6/faceDirection farmer 1/warp HogwartsOllivander 9 6/faceDirection HogwartsOllivander 3/pause 800/
        changeLocation {{ModId}}_Ollivanders/viewport 8 6 true/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsOllivander "I crafted the tree's wood into a wand, and now...#$b#The Dark Lord's wand serves me."/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Andrew35:
none/23 19/farmer 23 19 3 HogwartsAndrew 27 19 3 HogwartsSlughorn 18 19 2/addObject 22 17 {{ModId}}_PewterCauldron 1/addObject 26 17 {{ModId}}_PewterCauldron 1/skippable/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsSlughorn "Everyone should be finishing up their potions!"/pause 800/
        faceDirection farmer 1/pause 800/
        question null "#Andrew, how did you complete your potion so effortlessly?"/pause 800/
        textAboveHead HogwartsSlughorn "Three minutes remaining!"/pause 2500/
        emote farmer 8/pause 800/
        question null "#Wait...#Your potion still needs the finishing spell."/
        emote HogwartsAndrew 40/pause 800/
        emote farmer 8/pause 800/
        faceDirection farmer 3/pause 800/
        advancedMove HogwartsAndrew true 0 -1 4 200 0 1 2 200/
        speak HogwartsAndrew "*Where is she? She should be here by now.*"/pause 800/
        textAboveHead HogwartsSlughorn "One minute remaining!"/pause 800/
        emote farmer 40/pause 800/
        move farmer 1 0 1 false/pause 800/
        temporarySprite 25 18 3 8 8 false 2/
        stopAdvancedMoves/emote HogwartsAndrew 16/faceDirection HogwartsAndrew 3/pause 800/
        move HogwartsSlughorn 0 -3 0 false/move HogwartsSlughorn 8 0 1 false/
        faceDirection HogwartsSlughorn 2/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsSlughorn "Ahh marvelous potion-work, Andrew!"/pause 800/
        emote HogwartsAndrew 40/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 61 62/faceDirection farmer 3/warp HogwartsAndrew 58 61/faceDirection HogwartsAndrew 2/addTemporaryActor HogwartsNkiruka 16 32 58 65 0 true Character/faceDirection HogwartsNkiruka 0/pause 800/
        changeLocation {{ModId}}_HogwartsTransfigurationWing/viewport 59 63 true/pause 800/
        move HogwartsNkiruka 0 -2 0 false/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsNkiruka "I am so sorry I’m late, Andrew."/pause 800/
        emote HogwartsAndrew 16/pause 800/
        move farmer -2 0 3 false/pause 800/
        emote farmer 8/pause 800/
        question null "#Nkiruka, are you fabricating magic for Andrew?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsAndrew "Quiet.#$b#Follow me."/pause 800/
        emote HogwartsNkiruka 28/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 64 42/faceDirection farmer 1/warp HogwartsAndrew 66 42/faceDirection HogwartsAndrew 3/addTemporaryActor HogwartsNkiruka 16 32 65 41 2 true Character/faceDirection HogwartsNkiruka 2/pause 800/
        viewport 65 42 true/pause 800/
        question null "#Andrew is doing what?!"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsNkiruka "Andrew is impersonating my brother who passed away."/pause 800/
        question null "#How has he not been caught yet?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsNkiruka "I am a transfer student from Uagadou. Over there, people are expected to know wandless magic, so I have been using my skills to fabricate Andrew’s magic in his classes."/pause 800/
        question null "#Andrew, why are you not doing your own magic?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsAndrew "My parents... are magical, but I am not."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 16/
        question null "#You’re... a squib?"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsNkiruka "@, Andrew has a health condition that only lets him live to 19. This is my chance to help him before he..."/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsAndrew "Someone is coming. We’ll talk later."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 40/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Andrew15:
none/19 11/farmer 20 15 0 HogwartsAndrew 20 12 0 HogwartsNkiruka 17 12 0 HogwartsHermione 20 8 2/skippable/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsHermione "Welcome class. I am Professor Granger, and I will be your substitute transfiguration professor for now until I am summoned by the Ministry.#$b#Now, let’s see your proficiency.#$b#Andrew, you are up first."/pause 800/
        emote HogwartsAndrew 40/pause 800/
        faceDirection HogwartsAndrew 3/faceDirection HogwartsNkiruka 1/faceDirection farmer 3/
        speak HogwartsAndrew "Vero verto"/
        speak HogwartsNkiruka "..."/pause 800/
        emote farmer 8/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsHermione "Flawless transfiguration, Andrew!"/pause 800/
        faceDirection HogwartsAndrew 0/faceDirection HogwartsNkiruka 0/faceDirection farmer 0/
        speak HogwartsHermione "Since you were watching so closely, let’s see yours, Nkiruka."/pause 800/
        emote HogwartsNkiruka 40/pause 800/
        faceDirection HogwartsNkiruka 1/faceDirection HogwartsAndrew 3/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsNkiruka "Fera verta"/pause 800/
        speak HogwartsHermione "Good attempt, but not quite there."/pause 800/
        emote HogwartsNkiruka 28/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Wizard05:
none/4 17/farmer 5 17 3 Wizard 3 17 1/skippable/pause 800/
        speak Wizard "The Ministry has assigned me to be your mentor."/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/
        changeLocation CommunityCenter/viewport 43 21 true/pause 800/
        viewport move -3 -2 5500/pause 6000/
        speak Wizard "There are creatures you and I know as Junimos that reside in Stardew Valley, yet the world is unaware of their existence and power."/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 5 17/faceDirection farmer 3/warp Wizard 3 17/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 800/
        changeLocation WizardHouse/viewport 6 16 true/pause 800/
        speak Wizard "Thus, you will assist me in understanding their affinity to this plane."/pause 800/
        globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_HogwartsInvitation: Dear @,^We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Please find your nearest wizard tower to travel to the Scottish Highlands where you can begin your studies.^^Yours sincerely,^^Minerva McGonagall^Headmistress[#]Hogwarts Invitation
